paramInformation.label: Motion Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: The larger this value, the lower the sensitivity and the distance for motion detecting is closer

paramInformation.label: Motion Window Time
paramInformation.description: The specified time window in which the amount of pulses will trigger a motion event

paramInformation.label: Pulse Count
paramInformation.description: The amount of pulses during the specified time window which trigger a motion event

paramInformation.label: Motion Enable
paramInformation.description: Whether motion detection is enable or not

paramInformation.label: Motion Clear Time
paramInformation.description: The time to clear motion event after a motion event detected

paramInformation.label: LED Indicator Enable
paramInformation.description: Whether or not the LED blinks on motion detection

paramInformation.label: Binary Sensor Report Enable
paramInformation.description: Enable or disable sensor binary report when motion detected

paramInformation.label: Light Sensor Measure Interval
paramInformation.description: The time interval for the light sensor to measure the ambient light intensity

paramInformation.label: Light Intensity Differential Report
paramInformation.description: The differential between current measured and previously reported value. If the differential value is larger than the settings, device will report this measured light intensity to controller

paramInformation.label: Light Intensity Threshold
paramInformation.description: Whether motion detection is enable or not

paramInformation.label: Light Intensity Associated Enable
paramInformation.description: If enabled, if there is a motion event detected and the current light intensity is less than the settings in configuration 12, the device will send a BASIC_SET to nodes associated in group2. And if the current light intensity is larger than the settings in configuration 12, the device will not send BASIC_SET to nodes associated in group2

paramInformation.label: Motion Event Report Once Enable
paramInformation.description: If enabled only reports motion once until device reports cleared event

metadata.inclusion: Press the button 3 times within 1.5s to enter inclusion mode.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the button for 10s until LED light is on, then release the button.
